job.title: Software Engineer - Back End
job.description: This position is within our Applications Engineering organization, which is responsible for building Information Systems to support Tesla's rapid growth while providing amazing customer experience. The organization builds applications &amp; systems that bring our amazing Vehicles &amp; Energy products to customers. Some of the core functions include CRM, e-commerce, financial transactions, ERP &amp; manufacturing.<br><br>Digital Products Engineering, under the umbrella of Applications Engineering, builds our customer facing www.tesla.com that help our customers across 60+ countries understand our products, place and track the order status until delivery/install. The team also builds native and kiosk applications for our retail stores. In the backend, this team builds systems to manage our customer data, optimize schedule of service centers &amp; installation crews and several core platforms (Document Management, Adaptive Surveys, API Gateways etc.)<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Design, development and implementation of applications for Tesla customers on features like referrals (Loot Box), service center appointment management and support content</li><li>Use .net framework, .net core and MS SQL technology stack</li><li>Design software architecture based on business requirements, strategy and priorities</li><li>Promote software engineering best practices via code reviews, building tools and documentation</li><li>Be nimble and react quickly to changing business conditions</li><li>Leverage your existing skills while learning and implementing new, open source technologies as Tesla grows</li><li>Work with product managers, content producers, QA engineers and release engineers to own your solution from development to production <br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br><br></u></strong><strong>Must have<br></strong><ul><li>BS in Computer Science or equivalent discipline</li><li>Some experience with the .NET platform </li><li>Experience in MS SQL Server is required and good knowledge in query optimization</li><li>Expert knowledge of REST APIs</li><li>Good unit testing and integration testing practices</li><li>Experience with message queue architecture <br></li></ul><strong>Good to have<br></strong><ul><li>Exposure to Go, PHP, Java and other open source technologies</li><li>Experience with Docker and Kubernetes</li><li>Agile/SCRUM Software Development Process experience</li></ul>
